name: Cult Of Babel: Prologue
description:
This is the free prologue to Cult Of Babel - A roguelite Horde Survivors with dungeon crawling elements. This Prologue lets you access the first area of the game. Select your mighty steampunk witch or wizard, get the ancient cards of power and slaughter the horde of evil cultists guarding the tower of babel.



  • Fast-paced horde survival gameplay
  • Play as one of the legendary sorcerers
  • Get magic cards to upgrade your steampunk wizard's arsenal
  • Zany Synergies
  • Quick, 15 min sessions for quick fun



In this roguelite, arena survival game, the randomized cards you get change how you play the game completely. Become a thunder mage, control gravity and much more !





60+ cards to collect and upgrade ! The more cards you have in your deck, the more their effects combine and enable you to unleash the fury of ancient magic.







Play as one of the legendary sorcerers ! There are many characters to choose from each run.




https://store.steampowered.com/app/2078970/Cult_Of_Babel
  • New characters to unlock, each with their own weapon and ability
  • New areas to explore
  • New map variations
  • New booster packs and build diversity
  • Dungeon-crawling ! You'll be able to climb through the levels and fight the boss of the cult at the top of the tower
